description: 70 critics and filmmakers discuss cinema from the age old conflict between the artist and the observer, the creator and the critic. From 1998 to 2007, Kleber MendonÃ§a Filho has collected points of view about this relationship in Brazil, USA and Europe, using his personal experience as both filmmaker and critic.
